title.rendered: From Process Automation to Automation & Intelligence – INTECH set to bring its flagship automation & electrical portfolio with Industry 4.0 focused technologies to its clients in the energy and manufacturing industries

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]INTECH is repositioning itself to offer a portfolio of products & solutions that will enable its clients to capitalize on technologies of the Industry 4.0 age and transform for the future.

For almost 30 years, INTECH has been helping industrial businesses enhance process visibility, control, and reliability. Now, in a rapidly evolving digital world, the formerly known INTECH Process Automation is here to partner with its clients to bridge the Operational Technology and Information Technology gap and set them up for another generation of success.

As reflected in the new name, INTECH Automation & Intelligence will continue to offer its flagship automation & electrical products & services while offering specialized services and applications that facilitate energy and manufacturing organizations to transition into Industry 4.0 by providing OT Cybersecurity, Enterprise Data Management and Decision Support, and Industrial Operations applications using our proprietary data, software, and machine learning frameworks for domain-specific software applications that create tangible customer value.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

“…Now felt like the right time to formally evolve our brand into INTECH Automation & Intelligence to let [our] customers know that we are here to support them across all [digitalization] aspects…”

– Ahsan Sohail, President

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH’s President Ahsan Sohail spoke about the company’s journey towards a renewed and pronounced commitment to digitalization & intelligence: “INTECH has been operating in the intelligence realm for a few years now, helping customers modernize their data infrastructure, generate new business value through bespoke software applications, and secure critical OT assets through our cybersecurity consulting and implementation practices. Now felt like the right time to formally evolve our brand into INTECH Automation & Intelligence to let our existing and future customers know that we are here to support them across all aspects of the modern digital automation and intelligence stack.”

(INTECH’s legal entities will continue operating under their registered names e.g. INTECH Process Automation FZCO in Dubai and INTECH Process Automation Inc. in Houston unless notified otherwise. Please contact INTECH’s Regional Sales Directors & Managers for more details or send us your queries here)[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
